name: Psycho Cults
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Psy-Frenzy
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Psychotic Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Psy-Flame
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Surge. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spells.name: Psy-Incense
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Bane when attacking against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Psy-Cleansing
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with Disintegrate each.

spells.name: Psy-Strength
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get +1 to hit rolls in melee once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)
once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Psy-Rapture
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 18", which take 2 hits each.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Psychotic
specialRules.description: For each unmodified roll of 6 to hit when attacking, this model may roll +1 attack with that weapon. This rule doesnt apply to newly generated attacks.

specialRules.name: Psychotic Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Psychotic Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Psychotic Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Psychotic, it gets extra attacks on successful unmodified hit results of 5-6 from Psychotic (instead of only on 6).

specialRules.name: Protection Feat Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Protection Feat. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Relentless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Relentless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Unpredictable Fighter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Scout Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Scout. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Bounding
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, you may place all models with this rule in it anywhere fully within D3+1" of their position.

specialRules.name: Self-Destruct
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee, the attacking unit takes X hits. If this model survives melee, after both sides have finished attacking, it is immediately killed, and the enemy unit takes X hits.

specialRules.name: Disintegrate
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 3+, this weapon gets AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Shielded Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Shielded. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to check for wound effects (must always roll at least 1 die), and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Bane Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Bane when attacking against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Protection Feat
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this unit takes wounds and all its models have this rule, you may use this rule and roll one die per wound, and on a 4+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable
specialRules.description: When attacking, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Scout
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. After all other units are deployed, may be deployed anywhere fully within 12 of their deployment zone. Players alternate in placing Scout units, starting with the player that activates next.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Ignores Regeneration
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).
